recipe_name: How to cook Chinese sticky rice
author: Ching-He Huang
method: Heat a pan, add the rice and water, cover and cook on high heat for 15 minutes.  Turn the heat to low and simmer the rice for a further 3-4 minutes, making sure all the water has been absorbed and the rice is tender.  Take off the heat and, using a spatula, fluff up the rice grains. Serve.
